meanings.definition: A bronchodilator used to treat asthma and other respiratory conditions.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed terbutaline to help open up the patient's airways.
meanings.sent2: She always carries terbutaline with her in case of an asthma attack.
meanings.sent3: The terbutaline made the lungs dance happily with each breath.
meanings.sent4: His wheezing was silenced by the magical powers of terbutaline.
meanings.sent5: The effect of terbutaline was like a refreshing breeze for her lungs.

meanings.definition: To administer terbutaline to a patient in order to alleviate breathing difficulties.
meanings.sent1: The nurse will terbutaline the patient to help him breathe easier.
meanings.sent2: They terbutaline the young boy quickly during the asthma attack.
meanings.sent3: The doctor joked that he could terbutaline the whole town if needed.
meanings.sent4: She terbutalined the situation, bringing relief to the struggling patient.
meanings.sent5: The paramedic skillfully terbutalined the patient, saving his life.
